A mụrụ Ernest bediako sampong na June 1956, ọ bụ onye Ghana na-ere ọgwụ na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Ernest Chemist ma nye ya onye nke afọ na onyinye EMY Africa 2020.0.

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Adisadel College na Cape Coast, Ghana. Ọ gara n'ihu na Mahadum nke Ghana Medical School mana o mechara daa gaa Mahadum Kwame Nkrumah nke Sayensị na Teknụzụ, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science na Pharmacy
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ernest Chemist Limited, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ nke na-ere, na-ekesa ma na-emepụta Ọgwụ. N'afọ 2009, o guzobere NestPharma Company Limited na Freetown, Sierra Leone.
Ernest enwetala ihe nrite na mmata na azụmaahịa na ọgwụ.
